body_html:
There are no input guarantees provided in distributed TensorFlow at this time (i.e., no guarantees that every example has been seen exactly once in an epoch). It is something we're looking into, but no concrete timeline.

Doing that and then being able to ensure that samples trained on by the backup workers are picked up in future steps by other workers is something that will require a detailed design and proposal. I'm tempted to close this issue since it isn't a simple feature request.

If you'd like to contribute this, I would encourage you to think through a possible design and share detailed design thoughts here. Thanks!
